name: Armani's Forest
description:
Description

I hope you like either mushrooms or zombies because that's what you're gonna get. Play as a mushroom and protect your home from invaders. Good luck as you protect your home from the threats of human society.

Notes
  • Approximate 30-60 minutes of play time across 5 levels
  • Made by a solo game dev
  • This was mostly created as practice with Unity, but I still hope you enjoy it
  • The Linux version is untested, good luck
@jadenmcelvey  Jaden Mcelvey
